sub_title: Inside Sales Representative | Msc Management | Bachelor degree in Intercultural studies
summary: I have combined expertise in directing multiple initiatives simultaneously using strong time management and prioritization skills. Throughout my career, I have attained Administrative and experience in sales field that will surely add value to the success of your organization. My Signature Highlights: •I have studied and worked in three different countries. Working in an international environment was a tremendous opportunity to broaden my professional and personal horizons. It contributed to the development of my language skills and it also strengthened my ability to interact and network smoothly with people from diverse backgrounds. • I am a service-oriented professional • I am skilled in overseeing day-to-day activities with a keen focus on ensuring continuous operational excellence. • I am instrumental in delivering an optimal level of (internal) customer service to ensure satisfaction and experience. • I am proficient in developing and maintaining robust relationships with staff and key stakeholders. • I have proven success in providing training to new staff for improving productivity and performance. •I am Italian, I am fluent in English (plus knowledge of Spanish and French). As my professional career continues to evolve, I remain steadfast in my belief that collaboration is the key to business success therefore, on a daily basis I am committed to building positive relationships with interdepartmental teams, senior management, clients, and key stakeholders to realize strategic business goals.
